name: gha-git-credentials
description: A GitHub action for setting up git credentials

scripts.build: ncc build index.js -o dist && cp ./action.sh dist
scripts.dependents-discovery-list: @echo NB! public_repo token is required && ghtopdep https://github.com/OleksiyRudenko/gha-git-credentials --description --token

author: Oleksiy Rudenko
